name: 4790-react-node-graphql
description: Three projects in one: node, react, graphql for DGM 4790

scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../graphql-server && npm install
scripts.build: npm install && cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start-dev: concurrently --kill-others "nodemon index.js" "cd graphql-server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm start"

author: Wyatt Allan
